reviewText: Watched the movie on RTVE.ES website.  You really need to watch the series to understand what's going with the movie.  Also, i don't know who Joan Crosas is, but David Janer is the actor playing Gonzalo/Aguila Roja.  Hope someone at Amazon corrects that mistake.
Great story, acting, scenery.  Hope to see the TV series with English subtitles become available. Watched first five seasons on Netflix,but would like to own the entire series.
Complements the series beautifully, Fair price with blue ray quality, though I am not sure it is ideal for people who never watch the series as it would be a little hard to catch up.
